thread.title: Melissa Thomas
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Melissa Thomas

author: Melissa Thomas
title: Melissa Thomas
text: Ordered my daughters first prom dress from Peaches and it was here in less than a week and was beautiful. We looked locally however we were not able to find the dress she loved, someone recommended Peaches Boutique. Great experience, would recommend it to anyone! They have a great return policy if needed, which is a huge benefit when ordering online.
